articles.title: Google removed 2.7 billion bad ads, nearly 1 million ad accounts in 2019 - Search Engine Land
articles.description: This year,the company says it has removed "tens of millions" of COVID-19 related ads.
articles.content:
Last year, Google says it took down 2.7 billion so-called bad ads for violating the company’s ad policies, according to its annual report released Thursday. 
That’s up from the 2.3 billion bad ads Google reported taking down in 2018. The number of ad account… [+3064 chars]

articles.description: Apple's iPhone SE for 2020 is $300 cheaper than the baseline iPhone 11. Here's what you get (and don't get) for that price.
